bibl.title: Dedication of the Prostates of a Synodos from Alexandria.
bibl.note: Alexandria, reign of Augustus. - Reproduces 12 inscriptions commemorating dedications made to various associations (synagogai, synodoi) by their heads (prostatai), and adds 6 others, deprived of some elements such as the mention of a synodos or a function.
LAJTAR Adam, Dedication of the Prostates of a Synodos from Alexandria.
